functions.name: aboutToAppear
functions.description: 组件即将出现时触发，用于初始化操作

functions.name: aboutToDisappear
functions.description: 组件即将消失时触发，用于清理资源

functions.name: build
functions.description: UI声明式构建方法，状态变化时重新执行

functions.name: onDidBuild
functions.description: 组件完成构建后触发，用于构建后的处理

lifecycle.dynamicBehavior: 当showChild状态从true变为false时，触发SimpleChild.aboutToDisappear；当从false变为true时，触发SimpleChild.aboutToAppear → SimpleChild.build → SimpleChild.onDidBuild。组件删除顺序严格遵循从父到子的原则，父组件的aboutToDisappear先于子组件执行。
